players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Charlie has been investigating and found out that Diana is the mafioso. We need to act fast."
Diana: remained silent.
You: remained silent.
Diana: "I will remain silent and let the game unfold. I'll continue to act as a villager until proven otherwise."
Charlie: "I will continue to monitor Diana closely. If she tries to lie about her actions or if any evidence points towards her, I'll take action."
You: "Let's all stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other. We need to gather more information before making any accusations."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie has been investigating and found out that Diana is the mafioso. We need to act fast."
Diana: remained silent.
Alice: remained silent.
Diana: "I will remain silent and let the game unfold. I'll continue to act as a villager until proven otherwise."
You: "I will continue to monitor Diana closely. If she tries to lie about her actions or if any evidence points towards her, I'll take action."
Alice: "Let's all stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other. We need to gather more information before making any accusations."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Charlie has been investigating and found out that Diana is the mafioso. We need to act fast."
You: remained silent.
Alice: remained silent.
You: "I will remain silent and let the game unfold. I'll continue to act as a villager until proven otherwise."
Charlie: "I will continue to monitor Diana closely. If she tries to lie about her actions or if any evidence points towards her, I'll take action."
Alice: "Let's all stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other. We need to gather more information before making any accusations."
